title: lol logo error
body: after downloading league of legends , and going on  the game the logo  pops up and it doesn't work what do I do guys

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if that helps.
